data.title: Forest patch detection
data.point1: Monitoring the forest cover by using image footage
data.point2: Identify obstacles and determine the forest areas accurately

data.title: Water Bodies Identification System in Forest Area
data.point1: Identify every water body that is situated in the forest
data.point2: Identify obstacles and determine the forest areas accurately

data.title: Wild Fire Detection System
data.point1: Identify any unauthorized/illegal constructions in the forest.
data.point2: Emphasis should be placed on dangerous/unsafe roads, shortcuts, and unmarked roads used by people.
